crawl_url.title: Crawl URL
crawl_url.description: The source URL of the Business Detail Page.

phone_number.title: Phone Number
phone_number.description: The primary phone number of the business.

full_address.title: Full Address
full_address.description: The full street address, city, state, and ZIP.

general_info.title: General Info
general_info.description: The 'General Info' text block for the business.

logo_url.title: Logo URL
logo_url.description: URL of the business logo, if present.

other_links.title: Other Links
other_links.description: Additional links from the 'More Info' section.

social_links.title: Social Links
social_links.description: Links to social media profiles (e.g., Facebook).

gallery_image_urls.title: Gallery Image URLs
gallery_image_urls.description: List of URLs for gallery images.

years_in_business.title: Years in Business
years_in_business.description: Text indicating years in business, e.g., '41 Years in Business'.

places_near_with_category.title: Places Near
places_near_with_category.description: List of links to nearby places.

crawl_error.title: Crawl Error
crawl_error.description: The specific error message if scraping failed for this URL.
